title: Michael Meacher dies aged seventy-five.
text: Bluebarge said: powerstroke said: Another who did a lot of damage to working people using climate change to further his career ... didn't he have about 12 houses ?? typical hand wringing hypocritical lefty oh well how sad never mind... Edited by powerstroke on Thursday 22 October 09:08 4 posts in. You even managed to mention climate change. Do you get some sort of prize from the NP&E brotherhood for that? not sure !! you have any opinion yourself ??? I do. My opinion is that you shouldn't speak ill of the dead unless they genuinely deserve it, and Michael Meacher was at least a decent and hard-working MP who made a respectable fist of the ministerial jobs he was given, even if you don't agree with his views. The DT obituary manages to summarise him with a bit more class than you did.
